thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence: Donald Trump as president would be 'the end of the world'
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence: Donald Trump as president would be 'the end of the world'

author: Christie D&apos;Zurilla
title: Jennifer Lawrence: Donald Trump as president would be 'the end of the world'
text:
Jennifer Lawrence: Donald Trump as president would be 'the end of the world' Jennifer Lawrence, Donald Trump Murray Close / Lionsgate, left; Jamie McCarthy / Getty Images, right. 
Jennifer Lawrence, here as Katniss Everdeen with Josh Hutcherson as Peeta Mellark, left, doesn't want to see Donald Trump as president or, we presume, Melania Trump, right, as first lady. 
Jennifer Lawrence, here as Katniss Everdeen with Josh Hutcherson as Peeta Mellark, left, doesn't want to see Donald Trump as president or, we presume, Melania Trump, right, as first lady. (Murray Close / Lionsgate, left; Jamie McCarthy / Getty Images, right.) Christie D'Zurilla Contact Reporter 
As the Mockingjay, Jennifer Lawrence isn't afraid of anything. But as Jennifer Lawrence, she's apparently afraid of Donald Trump. 
"If Donald Trump becomes president, that will be the end of the world," the 25-year-old actress told Entertainment Weekly during a group interview with costars Liam Hemsworth and Josh Hutcherson. 

For the record 
5:26 p.m. Oct. 1: An earlier version of this story referred to Liam Hemsworth as Chris Hemsworth.
